Row.Text: Very well.
All right.
Certainly.
It is agreed.
Oh, very well.
I suppose I must.
Excellent.
Excellent! You have fallen into my trap at last!
What an extraordinarily idiotic decision. You shall pay for this foolishness.
You degraded villain! We shall bury you!
I have determined that your country poses a threat to Germany's vital national interests. I have therefore decided - with great reluctance, I assure you - to destroy you.
It has become clear to me that our two nations must inevitably come to blows. I have no desire to wait until you have grown even more powerful, so prepare for war!
Your continued existence poses a threat to German interests. Prepare for war.
Germany has been destroyed - I weep for future generations!
I congratulate you on your victory. The forces of history must truly be on your side.
Inconceivable! I, Otto Von Bismarck - Duke of Lauenburg, Prime Minister of Prussia, and First Chancellor of Germany - I have been defeated by the likes of YOU?!
I congratulate you on your victory. May your great empire stand for a thousand-thousand years!
Give us the following if you wish for your pitiful country to survive.
Germany needs your assistance, friend. It would be in your country's best interest to comply.
Germany demands this from you immediately. Our troops await your response.
No.
Certainly not.
We decline.
Of course not.
That's unacceptable.
You cannot be serious!
I beg your pardon?
The mighty German people greet you, Stranger.
Germany greets you. I pray that there will always be peace between our two great peoples.
On behalf of the great German people, I bid you welcome!
Good day.
Farewell.
Goodbye.
Until we meet again.
Go away now.
That is all.
Our business here is done.
Yes?
Hello!
Well?
What do you want?
Well? Out with it!
To what do I owe the honor of your presence?
Let's hear it.
Go ahead.
Proceed.
I'm listening.
Yes?
You were saying?
And?
Go on.
Let us call that a tie, shall we?
I am glad that we could come to an equitable and honorable peace.
Germany acknowledges your victory. You are to be congratulated.
Not by speeches and votes of the majority, are the great questions of the time decided — that was the error of 1848 and 1849 — but by iron and blood.
A conquering army on the border will not be stopped by eloquence.
God has a special providence for fools, drunks, and the United States of America.
All treaties between great states cease to be binding when they come in conflict with the struggle for existence.
Unacceptable, unacceptable, unacceptable! Improve your offer or be gone!
That's not good enough.
You must do better than that.
Almost…
Germany cannot accept your offer, friend. Surely you can do better?
Is that the best you can do?
You're almost there…
Almost…
Certainly not. You must do better.
Can you do a little better?
That's not quite good enough.
Almost…
No! That is absolutely out of the question!
With all of the goodwill in the world, I must decline your offer.
Germany has no interest in your offer at this time.
Very well.
Excellent! You show great perspicacity.
That is acceptable.
You would do well to consider this offer carefully.
I believe that this arrangement will profit both of our people, friend. What do you say?
The generous German people make you this extremely equitable offer.
Come and get it, you arrogant fool.
Such a move would not be in our best interest at this time.
Germany does not bow to threats from inferior nations.
Is there no end to your arrogance? We will remember this.
Very well. I trust that you will do the same for Germany in the future.
Very well. The balance of forces is in your favor - for now.
You are playing a dangerous game.
Such bravado may be dangerous, particularly if one doesn't have the force to back it up.
So you choose to call my bluff, eh? I congratulate you.
How very disappointing.
We shall remember this!
How foolish of you.
I trust that you have learned the folly of getting in mighty Germany's way.
Very well. I hope that you have learned your lesson.
I am glad that you at last recognize mighty Germany's superiority. Do not cross us again!
